0P00005UUJ.BO.summary: The objective of the scheme is to achieve capital appreciation by investing predominantly in diversified stocks that are generally termed as mid-cap stocks.
0P00005UUJ.BO.manager_bio: S Krishnakumar is an engineer from REC (now National Institute of Technology), Trichy, he received an MBA from LIBA, Chennai. 0P0000A4KC.BO.summary: The investment objective is to seek to generate long-term capital appreciation from a portfolio that predominantly invests in equity and equity-related securities of Mid Cap companies. However, there can be no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be realised.
0P0000A4KC.BO.manager_bio: Harshad Patwardhan, executive director, is a country specialist for Indian Equities and a member of the India Team within Emerging Markets and Asia Pacific (EMAP) Equities Team based in India. Harshad joined the Firm in 2006 from Deutsche Equities India Pvt. Ltd as a senior analyst for two years and JPMorgan India Pvt Ltd covering oil & gas, petrochemicals, automobiles, engineering & power utilities sectors for four years. He began his career in 1994 as a research analyst covering oil & gas and engineering sectors with Inquire for a year and later with Marlin Partners for two years; Caspian Research India for a year and Indosuez W.I. Carr Securities for two years. Harshad obtained a Bachelor of Technology in mechanical engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay and an M.B.A. in finance from Indian Institute of Management, Lucknow. He is also a CFA charterholder.
